mapper.insert:
insert into mabangshipment (orderNo, paymentTime, shipMethod, shipNo, storeName, clientAcount, clientName, clientTelphone, country, productUnitPrice, productTotalAmount, productTotalCost, freightRevenue, shipmentExpenses, weight, sku, productName, productNumbers, productDirectory, currency, orderTotalAmout, createTime, url, item_id) values
(#{item.orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paymenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.shipmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.shipno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientacount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clientname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.clienttelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productunitprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.producttotalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.producttotalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.freightrevenue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.shipmentexpenses,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productnumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productdirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ordertotalamout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.item_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select orderNo, m.shipNo, productUnitPrice, productTotalCost, productNumbers, m.sku, state, s.unitCost, m.url
from mabangshipment m left JOIN skuinfo s on m.sku = s.sku where 1=1
and state = 0
and state =1 and paymentTime >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 2 day)
and state =1
order by paymentTime desc limit #{page,jdbcType=INTEGER},20

select count(*) from mabangshipment m left JOIN skuinfo s on m.sku = s.sku where 1=1
and state = 0
and state =1 and paymentTime >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 2 day)
and state =1
order by paymentTime desc
